reviewText: I just received this to give as a gift and the entire box is in Chinese????  I immediately put it in and the DVD is playing in English.

I was expecting the American version of this movie, but the box has a foreign language along with American English and offers subtitles in foreign language as well. It works, but is not exactly what I expected.
One of the finest examples of Tarantino's eccentric, brutally lavish, gun-happy humour. This is gold!!!!
